attributes.action: Allow driving instructors to carry out driving examinations and to pass students
attributes.additional_details: Discuss with the DVSA to cope with demand go learner drivers on the road ASAP
attributes.background: Following recent unprecedented demand on driving tests in England, the government should allow driving instructors to pass students and give them a licence and carry out examinations.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549207
